import React from 'react' const Inquiry = () => { const [selectedButtons, setSelectedButtons] = useState([]); const toggleActive = (value) => { setSelectedButtons((prevSelected) => prevSelected.includes(value) ? prevSelected.filter((item) => item !== value) : [...prevSelected, value] ); }; const isActive = (value) => selectedButtons.includes(value); return ( <>
Drop Us a Line

Service You Need
onClick={() => toggleActive('mobileDevelopment')}


Your Budget(Optional)



Attach Files(Optional)


) } export default Inquiry
